name: GetReadOperationResult
description: This interface is used for getting OCR results of Read operation. The URL to this interface should be retrieved from 'Operation-Location' field returned from Batch Read File interface.

operationId.description: Id of read operation returned in the response of the 'Batch Read File' interface.

$block: OCR result of the read operation.

$ul: **recognitionResults**: An array of text recognition result of the read operation.
**status**: Status code of the text operation.

$block: Details about the API request error.

$ul: **message**: A message explaining the error reported by the service.
